results.name: a(1) = 1; for n > 1, a(n) = 9*8^{A000120(n-1)-1}.
comment: Also, this is a row of the square array A255740.
link: Felix Fröhlich, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: Also, written as an irregular triangle in which the row lengths are the terms of A011782, the sequence begins:
